name: Fuzzy Navel
preparation:
The Fuzzy Navel proves that you only need two mere ingredients to create a notorious cocktail. New Jersey bartender and author of “Bartending for Dummies” Ray Foley mixed equal-parts peach schnapps and orange juice to create a fruity highball that has been going strong since the 1980s.

Add all ingredients into a highball glass over ice.

(To make a Hairy Navel, substitute vodka for half the peach schnapps.).
